Choose the plan that fits your needs. All plans include our core A/B testing features.

Frequently Asked Questions

How does the A/B testing work?

Our platform automatically rotates your title variants and measures performance metrics like views, click-through rates, and engagement to determine the winning title.

Can I cancel anytime?

Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. There are no long-term contracts or cancellation fees.

Do you offer a free trial?

Yes, all plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

How many channels can I connect?

The number of channels depends on your plan. Starter allows 1 channel, Pro allows 3 channels, and Enterprise allows unlimited channels.
